about:
Hi, I'm Brady Dorsey, a developer based in Houston, TX, with a robust background in logistics and data technology. My passion lies in creating video games and full-stack web applications.

 After earning a certificate in Software Engineering from Flatiron School, I've immersed myself in learning new technologies and developing innovative solutions. My transition into programming was fueled by a drive to innovate and make a meaningful impact on technologyâ€™s future. I am dedicated to leveraging my skills to craft solutions that empower businesses and inspire the next generation of tech enthusiasts.
